The ten qualities of a mendicant worthy: Conducting themselves well and seeking alms in suitable places
Seeing danger in the slightest fault and keeping the rules they’ve undertaken
Being very learned and remembering and keeping what they’ve learned
Having good friends, companions, and associates
Wielding the many kinds of psychic power
Recollecting many kinds of past lives
Realizing the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life
The different types of clairvoyance that: Clairaudience that is purified and superhuman
Clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman
The different things that a mendicant ca: Sentient beings passing away and being reborn
Beings in a good place or a bad place
How sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds
